snippet: Xi Jinping, who is expected to take over the Communist Party, was last seen in public on Sept. 1, raising questions about his health.
abstract: China's next designated leader Xi Jinping reappears in public, two weeks after mysteriously disappearing from view.
lead_paragraph: Xi Jinping, who is expected to take over the Communist Party, was last seen in public on Sept. 1, raising questions about his health.

headline.main: A Leader in China Reappears in Public
headline.print_headline: A Leader In China Reappears In Public
